statements: SELECT * FROM historical_texts
SELECT text_title, author FROM historical_texts
SELECT * FROM historical_texts WHERE author = 'Shakespeare'
SELECT text_title FROM historical_texts WHERE publication_year > 1800
SELECT text_content, author FROM historical_texts ORDER BY text_title DESC
SELECT * FROM historical_texts WHERE author = 'Shakespeare' ORDER BY publication_year DESC, text_title ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT text_title, author FROM historical_texts WHERE publication_year > 1800 ORDER BY author ASC, text_title DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS text_count FROM historical_texts GROUP BY author ORDER BY text_count DESC
SELECT * FROM historical_texts WHERE publication_year BETWEEN 1600 AND 1700 ORDER BY text_id ASC LIMIT 8
SELECT text_title, publication_year FROM historical_texts WHERE author IN ('Jane Austen', 'Charles Dickens')
SELECT * FROM HistoricalTexts;
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM HistoricalTexts WHERE publication_date > '1800-01-01';
SELECT text_id, title, author FROM HistoricalTexts WHERE author = 'Shakespeare';
SELECT * FROM Manuscripts ORDER BY date_discovered DESC;
SELECT manuscript_id, text_id, location FROM Manuscripts WHERE location LIKE '%library%';

SELECT title, author FROM HistoricalTexts ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Manuscripts WHERE location='Library' AND condition='Good';

SELECT * FROM manuscripts WHERE manuscript_type = 'Handwritten';
SELECT manuscript_title, year_written FROM manuscripts ORDER BY year_written ASC;
SELECT text_title, author_name, publication_year FROM historical_texts WHERE publication_year > 1800;
SELECT * FROM manuscripts WHERE year_written < 1500 ORDER BY manuscript_title DESC;

SELECT text_title, author_name, publication_year FROM historical_texts WHERE author_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT manuscript_title, author_name, year_written FROM manuscripts WHERE manuscript_type = 'Poem' ORDER BY year_written DESC;
SELECT * FROM texts WHERE author = 'Shakespeare';
SELECT title, author FROM manuscripts WHERE year_written > 1800;
SELECT id, name, affiliation FROM researchers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE end_date IS NOT NULL;

SELECT title, author, year_written FROM manuscripts WHERE author = 'William Shakespeare';
